name: gh-actions-clubhouse-labeler
description: Github Action to sync labels between Clubhouse Story and its linked Pull Request

scripts.all: npm run build && npm run format && npm run lint && npm run package
scripts.test:git-dirty: [[ -z $(git status -s) ]] || (echo 'Your git worktree is dirty. Please stash or remove.' && /usr/bin/false)
scripts.release: yarn test:git-dirty && yarn standard-version && yarn push
scripts.push: git push origin :refs/tags/v1 && git tag -fa v1 -m v1 && git push --follow-tags origin master

author: chabou
